name: buttplug
description: Buttplug WASM library for web applications (Node/Web). Does not work for native node at the moment.

scripts.prebuild:all: yarn prebuild:win32 && yarn prebuild:darwin && yarn prebuild:linux
scripts.build:rust:node: cd ../ffi && cargo build --release && cd ../js && node scripts/install_core.js --from ../ffi/target/release
scripts.build:rust:browser: rimraf src/browser/buttplug-rs-ffi && cd ../ffi && cross-env RUSTFLAGS="--cfg=web_sys_unstable_apis" wasm-pack build -d../js/src/browser/buttplug-rs-ffi --release -- --features wasm --no-default-features && cd ../js && rimraf src/browser/buttplug-rs-ffi/.gitignore src/browser/buttplug-rs-ffi/package.json src/browser/buttplug-rs-ffi/README.md
scripts.build:proto: pbjs -t static-module -w es6 -o src/buttplug_ffi.js ../protobuf_schemas/buttplug_rs_ffi.proto && node scripts/modularize.cjs pbjs && pbjs -t static-module ../protobuf_schemas/buttplug_rs_ffi.proto | pbts -o src/buttplug_ffi.d.ts -
scripts.build:node: yarn build:node:rust && yarn build:node:gyp && yarn build:node:tsc
scripts.clean:node: rimraf dist/node && rimraf bin && yarn clean:node:gyp
scripts.build: yarn build:proto && yarn build:node && yarn build:webpack
scripts.build:production: yarn build:proto && yarn build:node && yarn build:webpack:production
scripts.build:publish: rimraf dist && rimraf bin && rimraf build && yarn build:production
scripts.clean: yarn clean:node && yarn clean:browser && rimraf dist
